scripts.start:dev: prisma deploy -e ./config/dev.env && env-cmd -f ./config/dev.env nodemon src/index.ts --exec 'tsc src/*.ts && babel-node src/index.js 2> /dev/null'
scripts.start:show-errors: prisma deploy -e ./config/dev.env && env-cmd -f ./config/dev.env nodemon src/index.ts --exec 'tsc src/*.ts && babel-node src/index.js'
